title: Chennai Slab Released
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chennai-Slab-Poster-Quote_5863.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chennai-Slab-Poster-OTF550_5976.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chennai-Slab-Poster-Text_5966.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chennai-Slab-Poster-Copy550_3945.png)

[Chennai Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/chennai-slab/) is an extension of the original [Chennai](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/chennai/). Chennai Slab is a simplified slab serif with over sixty OpenType alternates. These alternates include alternates for the ball terminals, unique simplified alternates and more traditional capital forms. Use Chennai Slab when you need a fun and versatile slab serif. The sans-serif Chennai makes a great complement. Six weights are available.

[Sample .pdf, 13 Pgs.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072621/http:/new.myfonts.com/artwork?id=32257&subdir=original)
author: Jeremy Dooley

comments.content:
Awesome typeface, great work! Looks like a mix between Archer and Grover Slab...

Jeo.
